mapper.insert: insert into tests (totalWords, correctRate, allWords, errorWords, correctWords, testType, createTime) values (#{totalWords}, #{correctRate}, #{allWords}, #{errorWords}, #{correctWords}, #{testType}, #{createTime})
mapper.select: select * from tests where testType=#{testType} and date(createTime)>=#{beginDate} and date(createTime)<=#{endDate} order by createTime desc
